title: Me Wantee!
description: Join the question-asking guy Virgil Sinclair as contestants answer trivia questions to win big money.
altHero: Moe Szyslak sits across from Virgil Sinclair on the set of a game show, two wheelbarrows of cash sit nearby
alt1: three contestants and the studio audience
alt2: Virgil Sinclair rubs handfuls of cash against his chest
alt3: Moe Szyslak thinks on a trivia question about subatomic particles
alt4: a woman presents one of the wheelbarrows of cash lit on fire
